reference.title: euscale-describe-termination-policy-types
reference.shortdesc: Returns a list of all termination policy types.

section.title: Options
section.p: This command has no specific options.

section.title: Output
section.p: This command returns a table that contains the following:

section.title: Examples
section.p: This command returns output similar to the following.
section.codeblock: TERMINATION-POLICY-TYPE OldestInstance TERMINATION-POLICY-TYPE OldestLaunchConfiguration TERMINATION-POLICY-TYPE NewestInstance TERMINATION-POLICY-TYPE ClosestToNextInstanceHour TERMINATION-POLICY-TYPE Default
